sense.def:
A room
je eden izmed ločenih delov v stavbi; ima stene, strop in vrata.

seg.quote: The room contained a couch and a glass cabinet.

sense.def:
Kadar nekje obstaja
room for something
, je tam dovolj prostora za določeno stvar.

seg.quote: There wasn't enough room for everybody.

sense.def:
Kadar obstaja
room for a particular kind of behaviour
, je določeno vedênje sprejemljivo.

seg.quote: There ought to be room for differences of opinion.
There is room for much more research.
